content.raw:
I just completed building a new machine and a new virtualbox. I setup both systems:

* Installed Ubuntu 14.04.05
* Installed ROS Indigo
* Installed Java-8
* Installed Gazebo 7.5
* Followed instructions on setup page. 1 through 13
* Upgrade ruby from 1.8 to 2.2
* downloaded all the erb files and created unique.world file

So on both systems I get the same error when I run:

roslaunch srcsim unique.launch init:="true"

* [ERROR] [1490101423.024784319, 5.591000000]: java.lang.RuntimeException: Cannot start realtime thread, do you have permission
* [ERROR] [1490101423.028395956, 5.591000000]: 	at us.ihmc.realtime.RealtimeThread.start(RealtimeThread.java:112)
* [ERROR] [1490101423.028678696, 5.591000000]: 	at us.ihmc.util.PeriodicRealtimeThreadScheduler.schedule(PeriodicRealtimeThreadScheduler.java:35)
* [ERROR] [1490101423.028911888, 5.591000000]: 	at us.ihmc.commonWalkingControlModules.controllerAPI.input.ControllerNetworkSubscriber.<init>(ControllerNetworkSubscriber.java:73)
* [ERROR] [1490101423.029179772, 5.591000000]: 	at us.ihmc.commonWalkingControlModules.highLevelHumanoidControl.factories.MomentumBasedControllerFactory.createControllerNetworkSubscriber(MomentumBasedControllerFactory.java:152)
* [ERROR] [1490101423.029409293, 5.591000000]: 	at us.ihmc.valkyrieRosControl.ValkyrieRosControlController.createDRCControllerFactory(ValkyrieRosControlController.java:142)
* [ERROR] [1490101423.029669608, 5.591000000]: 	at us.ihmc.valkyrieRosControl.ValkyrieRosControlController.init(ValkyrieRosControlController.java:253)
* [ERROR] [1490101423.029912237, 5.591000000]: 	at us.ihmc.rosControl.IHMCRosControlJavaBridge.initFromNative(IHMCRosControlJavaBridge.java:103)
* [ERROR] [1490101423.030210538, 5.591000000]: Initializing controller 'ihmc_valkyrie_control_java_bridge' failed

Gazebo launches, Val is there, Controller fails, Val drops to ground when released.

It appears to be a permission problem for the controller. I searched all the issues postings looking for clues to which step I missed. Does anyone remember what the fix was to this?

I think that the stetup instructions are a work in progress and certain little fixes in the issues postings are not there or the software that gets downloaded on any given day may be a little different. Not sure which.

Any help would be appreciated.
content.html:
I just completed building a new machine and a new virtualbox. I setup both systems:

  • Installed Ubuntu 14.04.05
  • Installed ROS Indigo
  • Installed Java-8
  • Installed Gazebo 7.5
  • Followed instructions on setup page. 1 through 13
  • Upgrade ruby from 1.8 to 2.2
  • downloaded all the erb files and created unique.world file

So on both systems I get the same error when I run:

roslaunch srcsim unique.launch init:="true"

  • [ERROR] [1490101423.024784319, 5.591000000]: java.lang.RuntimeException: Cannot start realtime thread, do you have permission
  • [ERROR] [1490101423.028395956, 5.591000000]: at us.ihmc.realtime.RealtimeThread.start(RealtimeThread.java:112)
  • [ERROR] [1490101423.028678696, 5.591000000]: at us.ihmc.util.PeriodicRealtimeThreadScheduler.schedule(PeriodicRealtimeThreadScheduler.java:35)
  • [ERROR] [1490101423.028911888, 5.591000000]: at us.ihmc.commonWalkingControlModules.controllerAPI.input.ControllerNetworkSubscriber.<init>(ControllerNetworkSubscriber.java:73)
  • [ERROR] [1490101423.029179772, 5.591000000]: at us.ihmc.commonWalkingControlModules.highLevelHumanoidControl.factories.MomentumBasedControllerFactory.createControllerNetworkSubscriber(MomentumBasedControllerFactory.java:152)
  • [ERROR] [1490101423.029409293, 5.591000000]: at us.ihmc.valkyrieRosControl.ValkyrieRosControlController.createDRCControllerFactory(ValkyrieRosControlController.java:142)
  • [ERROR] [1490101423.029669608, 5.591000000]: at us.ihmc.valkyrieRosControl.ValkyrieRosControlController.init(ValkyrieRosControlController.java:253)
  • [ERROR] [1490101423.029912237, 5.591000000]: at us.ihmc.rosControl.IHMCRosControlJavaBridge.initFromNative(IHMCRosControlJavaBridge.java:103)
  • [ERROR] [1490101423.030210538, 5.591000000]: Initializing controller 'ihmc_valkyrie_control_java_bridge' failed

Gazebo launches, Val is there, Controller fails, Val drops to ground when released.

It appears to be a permission problem for the controller. I searched all the issues postings looking for clues to which step I missed. Does anyone remember what the fix was to this?

I think that the stetup instructions are a work in progress and certain little fixes in the issues postings are not there or the software that gets downloaded on any given day may be a little different. Not sure which.

Any help would be appreciated.
